rules.natural: Either the state has declared an emergency, or if funding does not exist, then Disease X affects the population.
Provided that the state has lifted the emergency, the state has not declared an emergency.
Whenever containment has failed, containment is not controlled.
Under the condition that Protocol Alpha is executing, Protocol Alpha has been activated.
International aid has been requested, or the agency has not established a base camp.
If international aid has been received, then international aid has been rejected.
Should international aid be received, international aid is accepted.
Either international aid has been received, or international aid has not been requested.
Given that an outbreak of Disease X occurs in the valley, the river is contaminated in the valley.
Whenever international aid is accepted, international aid is not rejected.
If Disease X affects the population, an outbreak of Disease X occurs in the valley.
Provided that Disease X is spreading, Disease X is not contained.
Either the valley has been evacuated, or if it is not the case that the absence of funding implies Disease X affects the population, then Disease X is spreading.
Under the condition that the agency has deployed resources, the agency is monitoring the valley.
The agency has deployed resources, or funding exists.
If the agency has established a base camp, then the base camp is operating.
The agency has established a base camp, or the agency is not monitoring the valley.
In the event that it is not the case that the agency deploying resources implies the situation is stabilized, containment is controlled.
Under the condition that the negation of the implication that the agency deployed resources leads to the situation being stabilized does not imply containment has failed, Protocol Alpha is executing.
If it is not the case that the absence of funding implies Disease X affects the population, then Disease X is contained.

facts.natural: The state has lifted the emergency.
It is not the case that the river is contaminated in the valley.
The base camp is not operating.
Protocol Alpha has not been activated.
The valley has not been evacuated.

steps.natural: Should it not hold that the absence of funding implies Disease X affects the population, Disease X is spreading.
Provided that it is not the case that the absence of funding implies Disease X affects the population, Disease X is not contained.
Under the condition that funding does not exist, Disease X affects the population.
If funding does not exist, an outbreak of Disease X occurs in the valley.
Whenever funding does not exist, the river is contaminated in the valley.
Funding exists.
The agency has not established a base camp.
The agency is not monitoring the valley.
The agency has not deployed resources.
Funding exists.
The state has not declared an emergency.
Under the condition that funding does not exist, Disease X affects the population.
If funding does not exist, an outbreak of Disease X occurs in the valley.
Whenever funding does not exist, the river is contaminated in the valley.
Funding exists.

Whenever it is not the case that the absence of the implication that the agency deployed resources leads to the situation being stabilized implies containment has failed, Protocol Alpha has been activated.
Should it not hold that the agency deploying resources implies the situation is stabilized, containment has failed.
Provided that the agency deploying resources does not lead to the situation being stabilized, containment is not controlled.
Should the agency have deployed resources, the situation is stabilized.
The agency has not deployed resources.
Funding exists.
In the event that international aid is received, it is not the case that international aid has been rejected.
International aid has not been received.
International aid has not been requested.
The agency has not established a base camp.
The agency is not monitoring the valley.
The agency has not deployed resources.
Funding exists.

natural_facts.A2: An outbreak of Disease X occurs in the valley.
natural_facts.A8: The agency is monitoring the valley.
natural_facts.A9: The agency has established a base camp.
natural_facts.A11: The state has declared an emergency.
natural_facts.A12: The state has lifted the emergency.

(A11 ∨ (¬G → A3)).natural: Either the state has declared an emergency, or if funding does not exist, then Disease X affects the population.

(A12 → ¬A11).natural: Provided that the state has lifted the emergency, the state has not declared an emergency.

(A15 → ¬A14).natural: Whenever containment has failed, containment is not controlled.

(A17 → A16).natural: Under the condition that Protocol Alpha is executing, Protocol Alpha has been activated.

(A18 ∨ ¬A9).natural: International aid has been requested, or the agency has not established a base camp.

(A19 → A20).natural: If international aid has been received, then international aid has been rejected.

(A19 → A21).natural: Should international aid be received, international aid is accepted.

(A19 → ¬A20).natural: In the event that international aid is received, it is not the case that international aid has been rejected.

(A19 ∨ ¬A18).natural: Either international aid has been received, or international aid has not been requested.

(A2 → A1).natural: Given that an outbreak of Disease X occurs in the valley, the river is contaminated in the valley.

(A21 → ¬A20).natural: Whenever international aid is accepted, international aid is not rejected.

(A3 → A2).natural: If Disease X affects the population, an outbreak of Disease X occurs in the valley.

(A5 → ¬A4).natural: Provided that Disease X is spreading, Disease X is not contained.

(A6 ∨ (¬(¬G → A3) → A5)).natural: Either the valley has been evacuated, or if it is not the case that the absence of funding implies Disease X affects the population, then Disease X is spreading.

(A7 → A13).natural: Should the agency have deployed resources, the situation is stabilized.

(A7 → A8).natural: Under the condition that the agency has deployed resources, the agency is monitoring the valley.

(A7 ∨ G).natural: The agency has deployed resources, or funding exists.

(A9 → A10).natural: If the agency has established a base camp, then the base camp is operating.

(A9 ∨ ¬A8).natural: The agency has established a base camp, or the agency is not monitoring the valley.

(¬(A7 → A13) → A14).natural: In the event that it is not the case that the agency deploying resources implies the situation is stabilized, containment is controlled.

(¬(A7 → A13) → A15).natural: Should it not hold that the agency deploying resources implies the situation is stabilized, containment has failed.

(¬(A7 → A13) → ¬A14).natural: Provided that the agency deploying resources does not lead to the situation being stabilized, containment is not controlled.

(¬(¬(A7 → A13) → A15) → A16).natural: Whenever it is not the case that the absence of the implication that the agency deployed resources leads to the situation being stabilized implies containment has failed, Protocol Alpha has been activated.

(¬(¬(A7 → A13) → A15) → A17).natural: Under the condition that the negation of the implication that the agency deployed resources leads to the situation being stabilized does not imply containment has failed, Protocol Alpha is executing.

(¬(¬G → A3) → A4).natural: If it is not the case that the absence of funding implies Disease X affects the population, then Disease X is contained.

(¬(¬G → A3) → A5).natural: Should it not hold that the absence of funding implies Disease X affects the population, Disease X is spreading.

(¬(¬G → A3) → ¬A4).natural: Provided that it is not the case that the absence of funding implies Disease X affects the population, Disease X is not contained.

(¬G → A1).natural: Whenever funding does not exist, the river is contaminated in the valley.

(¬G → A2).natural: If funding does not exist, an outbreak of Disease X occurs in the valley.

(¬G → A3).natural: Under the condition that funding does not exist, Disease X affects the population.

A12.natural: The state has lifted the emergency.

¬A1.natural: It is not the case that the river is contaminated in the valley.

¬A10.natural: The base camp is not operating.

¬A11.natural: The state has not declared an emergency.

¬A16.natural: Protocol Alpha has not been activated.

¬A18.natural: International aid has not been requested.

¬A19.natural: International aid has not been received.

¬A6.natural: The valley has not been evacuated.

¬A7.natural: The agency has not deployed resources.

¬A8.natural: The agency is not monitoring the valley.

¬A9.natural: The agency has not established a base camp.
